M

main - package main
main is a package to launch the application.

MainFunctionsException - Exception in exceptions
Main Functions Exception tackles errors during Loading, Editing, Saving, ...

The Menu Bar of the game frame.

The window

margin - Static variable in class gui.GamePanel
 
margin - Static variable in class gui.HelpPanel
 
maze - package maze
The package describes the labyrinth.
Maze - Class in maze
A class for the maze considered as a graph.
Maze() - Constructor for class maze.Maze
maze for Open item
Maze(int, int) - Constructor for class maze.Maze
Builds a solvable maze with random boxes using Kruskal's algorithm.
MazeReadingException - Exception in exceptions
 
MazeReadingException(String, int, String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.MazeReadingException
 
menu - package menu
The package describes the menu bar and the menu items of the application.
minBoxSize - Static variable in class constant.LabyrinthModel
Minimum size of box(visible on the screen)
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.GameMirrorPanel
Allows you to switch to another type of box.
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.GameMirrorPanel
Another way to remove or add wall by dragging the mouse
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.GameMirrorPanel
 
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.GameMirrorPanel

mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.GameMirrorPanel
